what is the capital of france?: The capital of France is Paris.
who is the president of the united state: The current president of the United States is Joe Biden.
what is the tallest mountain in the worl: Mount Everest is the tallest mountain in the world.
who wrote romeo and juliet?: William Shakespeare wrote Romeo and Juliet.
what is the speed of light?: The speed of light is approximately 299,792 kilometers per second.
what is the largest ocean on earth?: The Pacific Ocean is the largest ocean on Earth.
who painted the mona lisa?: Leonardo da Vinci painted the Mona Lisa.
how many continents are there?: There are seven continents: Africa, Antarctica, Asia, Europe, North America, Australia, and South America.
what is the longest river in the world?: The Nile River is the longest river in the world.
what is the chemical symbol for gold?: The chemical symbol for gold is Au.
how many planets are in the solar system: There are eight planets in the solar system.
what is the capital of japan?: The capital of Japan is Tokyo.
what is the hardest natural substance on: Diamond is the hardest natural substance on Earth.
what year did the first moon landing occ: The first moon landing occurred in 1969.
who was the first person to walk on the: Neil Armstrong was the first person to walk on the moon.
what is the capital of germany?: The capital of Germany is Berlin.
what is the smallest country in the worl: The smallest country in the world is Vatican City.
what is the chemical formula of water?: The chemical formula of water is H2O.
who invented the telephone?: Alexander Graham Bell invented the telephone.
what is the most spoken language in the: The most spoken language in the world is English, followed closely by Mandarin Chinese.
what is the capital of italy?: The capital of Italy is Rome.
who developed the theory of relativity?: Albert Einstein developed the theory of relativity.
what is the currency of the united kingd: The currency of the United Kingdom is the British Pound Sterling (GBP).
what is the capital of russia?: The capital of Russia is Moscow.
what is the main ingredient in bread?: The main ingredient in bread is flour.
how many bones are in the human body?: There are 206 bones in the adult human body.
what is the largest desert in the world?: The largest desert in the world is the Antarctic Desert.
who invented the light bulb?: Thomas Edison is credited with inventing the light bulb.
what is the largest mammal on earth?: The largest mammal on Earth is the blue whale.
what is the national flower of japan?: The national flower of Japan is the cherry blossom (sakura).
what is the currency of china?: The currency of China is the Renminbi (Yuan).
who discovered electricity?: Benjamin Franklin is credited with discovering electricity.
what is the pythagorean theorem?: The Pythagorean Theorem states that a² + b² = c² in a right-angled triangle.
who painted the starry night?: Vincent van Gogh painted The Starry Night.
what is the capital of canada?: The capital of Canada is Ottawa.
how does photosynthesis work?: Photosynthesis is the process by which green plants use sunlight to synthesize food from carbon dioxide and water.
what is the boiling point of water?: The boiling point of water is 100°C (212°F) at sea level.
who was the first emperor of china?: Qin Shi Huang was the first emperor of China.
what is the tallest building in the worl: As of now, the tallest building in the world is the Burj Khalifa in Dubai.
what is the most abundant gas in the ear: Nitrogen is the most abundant gas in the Earth's atmosphere, making up about 78%.
what is the human body's largest organ?: The skin is the largest organ of the human body.
who is considered the father of computer: Charles Babbage is considered the father of computers.
what is the chemical formula for table s: The chemical formula for table salt is NaCl (sodium chloride).
what is the capital of brazil?: The capital of Brazil is Brasília.
what is the speed of sound?: The speed of sound in dry air at 20°C is about 343 meters per second (1235 km/h or 767 mph).
who invented the world wide web?: Tim Berners-Lee invented the World Wide Web in 1989.
what is the deepest ocean trench in the: The Mariana Trench is the deepest ocean trench in the world.
who wrote the harry potter series?: J.K. Rowling wrote the Harry Potter series.
what is the capital of south africa?: South Africa has three capitals: Pretoria (executive), Bloemfontein (judicial), and Cape Town (legislative).
who was the first woman in space?: Valentina Tereshkova was the first woman in space.
how long is a marathon?: A marathon is 42.195 kilometers (26.2 miles) long.
what is the coldest place on earth?: The coldest place on Earth is Antarctica, specifically the East Antarctic Plateau, where temperatures can drop below -90°C (-130°F).
what causes tides in the ocean?: Tides are caused by the gravitational pull of the Moon and the Sun on Earth's oceans.
